name: comete_sc_pmap_fusion
author: INRIA
description: Tool dedicated to fuse images and pmaps and get metrics from these pmaps
command-line: export PATH=:/sct/spinalcordtoolbox/bin:$PATH ;  unzip [PMAP_ARCHIVE] -d input_pmap; unzip [T2_ARCHIVE] -d input_t2; mkdir OUTDIR; python3 /comete_sc_pmap_fusion/main.py -pmap input_pmap/pmap -t2 input_t2/t2 -output OUTDIR && tar -cvzf [OUTPUT_FILE] OUTDIR

inputs.name: Pmap archive
inputs.description: Input archive containing all the pmaps present in a given exam

inputs.name: T2 archive
inputs.description: Input archive containing all the t2 present in a given exam

output-files.description: Tarball containing results. Results are expected under the form of .nii, .pdf and .tsv files, written in the OUTDIR
output-files.name: Output archive
